update zomore_member
member_number = #{memberNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_memberIdName = #{memberMemberidname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_phoneNumber = #{memberPhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_sex = #{memberSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_grade = #{memberGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_discount = #{memberDiscount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_balance = #{memberBalance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_money1 = #{memberMoney1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
member_money2 = #{memberMoney2,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
member_integral = #{memberIntegral,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
member_subCard = #{memberSubcard,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_coupon = #{memberCoupon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_password = #{memberPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_dateOfOpeningCard = #{memberDateofopeningcard,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_dueDate = #{memberDuedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_birthday = #{memberBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
member_address = #{memberAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_onCredit = #{memberOncredit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_creditLimit = #{memberCreditlimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
member_state = #{memberState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_guide = #{memberGuide,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where member_memberId = #{memberMemberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update zomore_member set member_number = #{memberNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_memberIdName = #{memberMemberidname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_phoneNumber = #{memberPhonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_sex = #{memberSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_grade = #{memberGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_discount = #{memberDiscount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_balance = #{memberBalance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_money1 = #{memberMoney1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, member_money2 = #{memberMoney2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, member_integral = #{memberIntegral,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, member_subCard = #{memberSubcard,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_coupon = #{memberCoupon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_password = #{memberPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_dateOfOpeningCard = #{memberDateofopeningcard,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_dueDate = #{memberDuedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_birthday = #{memberBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, member_address = #{memberAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_onCredit = #{memberOncredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_creditLimit = #{memberCreditlimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, member_state = #{memberState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_guide = #{memberGuide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_email = #{memberEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_qq = #{memberQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_shop = #{memberShop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_shopcar = #{memberShopcar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_recommendcode = #{memberRecommendcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_invitationcode = #{memberInvitationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_image = #{memberImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where member_memberId = #{memberMemberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select case when member_sex is null then '未知' else member_sex end as name, count(1) as value from zomore_member where member_shop =#{shop} group by member_sex

select member_memberId as memberMemberid,member_number as memberNumber,member_memberIdName as memberMemberidname,member_phoneNumber as memberPhonenumber, member_balance as memberBalance ,member_birthday as memberBirthday,member_image as memberImage from zomore_member where date_format( member_birthday, '%m%d' ) BETWEEN date_format( now( ) , '%m%d' ) AND date_format( date_add( now( ) , INTERVAL 2 DAY ) , '%m%d' ) and member_shop=#{shop}
select count(*) from zomore_member where member_number=#{member} and member_shop=#{memberShop}
